short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension shows the publishing or uploading date of related youtube videos in sidebar.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ever wondered if you could get the published date of related videos without even opening the videos in youtube, here is an extension which will solve this for you.
